name: Siege Climber
description:
Your time machine is stuck on top this medieval tower! Their ancient technology doesn't stand a chance against your superior climbing gear!

Controls:

Move Left: A / LMB / Left Arrow Key

Move Right: D / E / RMB / Right Arrow Key

Sprint: Left Shift

Wipe: Space / MouseWheel

Exit: Esc

Obstacles:

Poop: lose height

Rock: lose some height and health

Vomit: slow down

Boiling Water: slow down some and lose health

These effects are multiplied while sprinting so be careful!
